price: Kamar wannan ne Muke sarrafa ãyõyi, kuma dõmin su ce: "Kã karanta!" Kuma dõmin Mu bayyana shi ga mutãne waɗanda sunã sani.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِيَقُولُواْ دَرَسۡتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُۥ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuṣarrifu al-āyāti waliyaqūlū darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin yaʿlamūna
translations: and that We (may) make it clear
